title: Incest: the victim nobody believes
creator_credit: J. Gary Mitchell and J Gary Mitchell Film Company
brief_description: Openly discusses the issues of child sexual abuse and helps make the public aware of the extent of this problem. Points out the impact a childhood incestuous experience can have on a victim’s entire life.
creator_credit_for_label: J. Gary Mitchell and J Gary Mitchell Film Company
